description: User Token are revocable long lived tokens for users.

ID.description: ID is the identifier of the object.
ID.title: ID

claims.description: The list of claims delivered in the token.
claims.title: claims

clientType.description: the client type of the user token.
clientType.title: clientType

email.description: The email of the user who requested the token.
email.title: email

expirationDate.description: Tells when the token will expire.
expirationDate.title: expirationDate

name.description: Name of the token is specified while creating the token.
name.title: name

sourceIP.description: The source IP of the request that initiated the creation of the token.
sourceIP.title: sourceIP

token.description: The generated token. It won't be stored.
token.title: token

tokenID.description: The ID of the associated token.
tokenID.title: tokenID

transient.description: If true, the token will not be stored and will only be revocable if you keep track of the token ID yourself. Also, the validity will be capped and the token won't be long lived.
transient.title: transient

updateTime.description: Last update date of the object.
updateTime.title: updateTime

validity.description: Configures the validity of the token.
validity.title: validity

title: UserToken
